title: Chicken chow mein
ingredients: ['250g (9 oz) medium egg noodles', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '2 garlic cloves, peeled and finely chopped', '4 chicken breasts, cut into thin strips', '1 large red pepper, thinly sliced', '110g (4 oz) tinned sweetcorn', '8 spring onions, trimmed and cut into thin strips', '3 tablespoons light soy sauce']
